title: London, BL, Add. 14718
Digital Catalogue of Syriac Manuscripts in the British Library
Services for different occasions, consisting usually of an introductory prayer, ܨܠܘܬܐ ܕܫܘܪܝܐ a prooemium, a sedrā, a ܨܠܘܬܐ ܕܦܝܪܡܐ or ܥܛܪܐ, and a concluding prayer, ܚܘܬܡܐ .
small fragment of the commemoration of a Saint.
